entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low 8.

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 26.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 26. Humidex 30. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 6:12 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 7.
entry.summary: Showers ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 early in the evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 6:12 PM EDT Saturday 15 April 2023
